title: Gross domestic product ( GDP ) per capita in South Sudan 2024
yAxis: GDP per capita in U.S. dollars
summary: Overall GDP per capita in U.S. dollars has decreased over the Year.
GDP per capita in U.S. dollars is slightly decreasing from 2019 to 2020, roughly constant from 2020 to 2021, slightly increasing from 2021 to 2022, and lastly roughly constant from 2022 to 2023.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2021 and 2022.
Maximum GDP per capita in U.S. dollars, about 278.36 was reported at Year 2022
The lowest GDP per capita in U.S. dollars, of value 243.27 was reported at Year 2020
